doc.title: 18 Candles
doc.plot: Remember when you had your first kiss? Sally is a checked out high school senior one day away from her 18th birthday. Her best friend Scurvy does and says whatever he wants with total disregard to the world around him. When he finds out that Sally has never kissed a boy before, he makes it his mission to get her with the guy she likes before she turns 18. There is, however, only a few hours left. Yet another obstacle in her way, she has close down her step father's bowling alley for the night. Throw in the captain of the football team, a traveling knife salesman, a former model from France and Sally's first kiss may not turn out to be what was expected.
